p: Free radical scavenging activity was defined as the amount of antioxidant necessary to decrease and inactivate the initial DPPH radical to 50% in 30 min (IC 50 ± SD). The DPPH radical scavenging activity expressed as the IC 50 of the oil was 26.32 ± 4.52 µg/ml and quercetin as positive control demonstrated IC 50 of 9.1 ± 0.42 µM.
